dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id), event_name, "Change Old Value", "Change New Value"  
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE Event_name ILIKE '%Update%'
ORDER BY 1 desc

children.name: Vendors with immediate payment terms on their invoice but not on the PO

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"PO Vendor Name" 
,CASE 
	WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on PO'
    WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on Invoice but not on PO'
    WHEN "PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT in Master Data'
 ELSE 'ok'
 END AS "Immediate PT behavior"
,COUNT(case_id) 
	--FILTER(WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 AND "PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AS "Number of POs"  
,SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD")
	--FILTER(WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 AND "PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AS "Invoice Amounts" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE 
-- immediate pt on invoice but not on po
"PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0
 --AND "Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD" > 0
ORDER BY 3 desc

SELECT 
 (SELECT LAST(case_id) WHERE LAST(event_name) = 'Remove Payment Block')
,(SELECT LAST(event_name) WHERE LAST(event_name) = 'Remove Payment Block')



FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 desc
